column5: Last year I was out in April 23rd, when I started searching carp. This year the bite is early in the GTA. April 8th.  This is just a trail. Even tho they weren't finicky. They where hitting but I had to change up a few times to find out what size were thier mouths. I wasn't able to set the hook. First I had a hook that was too small then I changed up and the hook was too big. Tried a medium size hook.  Still kept missing them. Changed and took off the hair and went directly to a single medium size "thin wire" hook with no hair rig and then the fight was on.           Didn't stay out for long. I'm making plans to try out a new honey hole where the monsters lurk. Time to make-up ground bait and all the other goodies.  dsn
They bite because you're nice.  Can't wait to see what the new spot produces!
Great report!  I'll be making up some hair rigs and some mix with this report.  Thanks!
Yeah it's going to take a few days chumming then well see what gathers. Chummin starts tomorrow.  Going to need my heavier gear I guess for this place!!!  dsn
Sounds good to me, see yah out there.  dsn
nice report,good luck on the new spot
nice fish dsn! good to see you back again.  can't wait till my exams are over
Yeah make them snappy, and head out for some fun. The guys are out there just have to find them.  dsn.
